message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll take advantage of it!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but $90 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying right now.  How about $85?  I think that's a fair price for both of us.

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer you the product for $87.50. This is a fair price considering the value the product brings to you.
